title: Bones to bananas (tablet)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The bones to bananas tablet is an item that can be used by any player to change normal bones and big bones into bananas.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Bones to bananas (item)
This article is about the tablet. For the spell, see Bones to Bananas.
Bones to bananas

Item ID8014

The bones to bananas tablet is an item that can be used by any player to change normal bones and big bones into bananas.

Players can create this item on either a demon, teak demon, or mahogany demon lectern as long as they have 1 nature rune, 2 earth runes, 2 water runes, and 1 soft clay and at least level 15 Magic. Using a mud battlestaff, staff of earth, or staff of water can make this more cost-effective. The spell is transferred to a piece of soft clay at a lectern in the Study of a player-owned house, creating a magic tablet. The experience for casting the spell is gained at the time the tablet is created.

This tablet can be made regardless of the player's current spellbook.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
31 May 2013
(update)

The tablet versions of the 'Bones to Bananas' and 'Bones to Peaches' spells now work on the same kinds of bone as the spellbook versions of those spells.

22 February 2013
(update)

This content was included when the Old School RuneScape servers officially launched.

[[File:Bones to bananas (tablet) detail.png|left|100px]]
The '''bones to bananas''' tablet is an item that can be used by any player to change normal [[bones]] and [[big bones]] into [[banana]]s.

Players can create this item on either a [[Demon lectern|demon]], [[Teak demon lectern|teak demon]], or [[mahogany demon lectern]] as long as they have 1 [[nature rune]], 2 [[earth rune]]s, 2 [[water rune]]s, and 1 [[soft clay]] and at least level 15 [[Magic]]. Using a [[mud battlestaff]], [[staff of earth]], or [[staff of water]] can make this more cost-effective. The spell is transferred to a piece of soft clay at a lectern in the [[Study]] of a [[player-owned house]], creating a magic tablet. The [[experience]] for casting the spell is gained at the time the tablet is created.

This tablet can be made regardless of the player's current [[spellbook]].
